sentences.chinese: 禮之貌誠深矣，堅白同異之察，入焉而弱。
sentences.literal: Rites appearance truly deep, hard white same different discernment, enter therein weak.

sentences.chinese: 其貌誠大矣，擅作典制褊陋之說，入焉而望。
sentences.literal: Its appearance truly great, monopolize make standards narrow petty theories, enter therein gaze.

sentences.chinese: 其貌誠高矣，暴慢恣睢，輕俗以為高之屬，入焉而隊。
sentences.literal: Its appearance truly high, violent arrogant unrestrained, despise customs as high category, enter therein fall.

sentences.chinese: 故繩誠陳，則不可欺以曲直；
sentences.literal: Therefore cord truly displayed, then cannot cheat with crooked straight;

sentences.chinese: 衡誠縣，則不可欺以輕重；
sentences.literal: Balance truly hung, then cannot cheat with light heavy;

sentences.chinese: 規矩誠錯，則不可欺以方員；
sentences.literal: Compass square truly set, then cannot cheat with square round;

sentences.chinese: 君子審禮，則不可欺以詐偽。
sentences.literal: Superior man examines rites, then cannot cheat with deceit falsehood.
Compass square is square round utmost;

sentences.chinese: 然而不法禮者不足禮，謂之無方之民；
sentences.literal: However not model rites insufficient rites, called directionless people;

sentences.chinese: 法禮足禮，謂之有方之士。
sentences.literal: Model rites sufficient rites, called directed scholars.

sentences.chinese: 禮之中，能思索，謂之能慮；
sentences.literal: Ritual midst, able ponder, called able consider;
